      Methods in com.google.android.glass.TMM that return NetworkReachabilityManager 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NetworkReachabilityManager Context.getNetworkReachabilityManager()
      Replicators call this to get the NetworkReachabilityManager, and they register/unregister themselves to receive network reachability callbacks.
      NetworkReachabilityManager AndroidContext.getNetworkReachabilityManager() 
      Methods in com.google.android.glass.TMM with parameters of type NetworkReachabilityManager 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Context.setNetworkReachabilityManager(NetworkReachabilityManager networkReachabilityManager)
      Override the default behavior and set your own NetworkReachabilityManager subclass, which allows you to completely control how to respond to network reachability changes in your app affects the replicators that are listening for change events.
      void AndroidContext.setNetworkReachabilityManager(NetworkReachabilityManager networkReachabilityManager)
